citing_paper_authors: Yoko, Mizuta | Nigel, Collier
raw_text: Previous work on rhetorical analysis of scientific articles focus on either; 1) hierarchical discourse relations between sentences (e.g. Mann and Thompson, 1987), 2) genre analysis within a descriptive framework (e.g. Swales 1990), or 3) ZI in a flat structure and a statistical evaluation of the annotation scheme from a machine learning perspective (e.g. Teufel and Moens, 2002)
clean_text: Previous work on rhetorical analysis of scientific articles focus on either; 1) hierarchical discourse relations between sentences (e.g. Mann and Thompson, 1987), 2) genre analysis within a descriptive framework (e.g. Swales 1990), or 3) ZI in a flat structure and a statistical evaluation of the annotation scheme from a machine learning perspective (e.g. Teufel and Moens, 2002).
